title: 이달의소녀탐구 #353 (LOONA TV #353)
members: Olivia Hye, Yves, Go Won, Chuu
summary:
0:02 -- The MV shoot has started. Hye is shooting her lipsync.
0:10 -- Yves and Go Won are telling her how to lipsync and Yves starts saying why her reasoning is correct.
0:27 -- Olivia's part is done. "The most difficult part is the lipsync." Yves compliments her by saying that she did well. (She whispers something to Hye). Hye: "Khh, My ear is purified!"
0:42 -- Yves: "Hye is always very cute." Chuu: "That's right!".
Hye: "Actually cute isn't what I wanted. But with the angle, it becomes quite easy."
0:52 -- *insert Cute Hye expressions here* Suddenly, she feels ashamed. "Please edit it out!"
